analysis: The project is a website with a focus on Egyptian-themed design, light colors, desert aesthetics, and mobile responsiveness. The current state includes a basic HTML structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for functionality. The existing to-dos indicate that the mobile menu and navigation need improvements, and the CSS needs to be updated with an Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements. The goal is to ensure all buttons work and the design is clean and mobile-responsive.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with an Egyptian-themed color palette, including light colors and desert aesthetics, and ensure all buttons have proper styling and functionality.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax error by removing the word 'pełni' and re-implement the mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
